mapper.insert: insert into t_grdtdesign_account(id, semester, major, grade, class_num, stu_num, week_num, factor, workload, campus, period, creator, create_date, remark) values(#{id }, #{semester }, #{major.id }, #{grade }, #{classNum }, #{stuNum }, #{weekNum }, #{factor }, #{workload }, #{campus }, #{period }, #{creator.id }, #{createDate }, #{remark })
